foreignData.name: Verborgene Guerrillas
foreignData.text: Wenn einer Deiner Gegner erfolgreich einen Artefaktzauber spricht und die Verborgenen Guerrillas eine Verzauberung sind, werden die Verborgenen Guerrillas zu einer 5/3 Kreatur, die als Soldat zählt und Trampelschaden verursacht.

name: Hidden Guerrillas
originalText: When one of your opponents successfully casts an artifact spell, if Hidden Guerrillas is an enchantment, Hidden Guerrillas becomes a 5/3 creature with trample and that counts as a Soldier.

rulings.text: It changes into a creature even if the spell is countered.
When it turns into a creature, it is no longer an enchantment.

A noncreature permanent that turns into a creature can attack, and its {T} abilities can be activated, only if its controller has continuously controlled that permanent since the beginning of their most recent turn. It doesn’t matter how long the permanent has been a creature.

text: When an opponent casts an artifact spell, if Hidden Guerrillas is an enchantment, Hidden Guerrillas becomes a 5/3 Soldier creature with trample.
